title: Unable to connect to OCE servers.
body:
I tried to log in today after downloading the recent patch, after i downloaded the patch and continued to try and log on, i kept getting 'unable to connect to servers retry(1) - (3)'

I've reset my modem, computer
Repaired my league of legends client.
Neither of these options worked.

I did try and log into my NA account and it successfully logged in there.

Any idea why i was able to log into NA but not OCE?

replies.body: I have the same issue...Yesterday night was ok to play after update..............
